name: Bridgecard
long_description:
Bridgecard is the card issuer for Africa.  We make it easy for any fintech company to offer their customers a card that will carry a Mastercard or Visa logo and will work anywhere in the world.

Previously Tunde was building open banking APIs connecting Large banks in Nigeria to fintech companies. He also had to turn down a job at Google to build Bridgecard. 
Festus the CTO built the loan and retail management app at Trade depot (Salesforce for Africa). We've been working together and sharing the same room for over 10 years now.
